attributes.action: Get Our Army Out of Afghanistan Now & Deploy Them on UK Streets to Protect Lives & Property
attributes.additional_details: Our capital city and others have descended into anarchy and clearly our police have insufficient resources to deal with the isurrection.  Under these circumstances it is clearly ridiculous to be spending tax payers money by deploying our army in defending another country when our own society is under attack.  Our Army should be deployed in the UK now to keep the streets of our cities safe.
